Name: Royal New South Wales Bowling Association Incorporated

About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment; closed weekends and public holidays. Reference assistance available by mail and by telephone. Copying services available for books, journals and photographs.

About.Access: By arrangement with the Chief Executive Officer.

About.Acquisition focus: Records pertaining to the sport of lawn bowls in New South Wales.

About.Quantity: 21m (the majority of the archive is in the care of the State Library of NSW, Mitchell Library).

About.Major holdings: Royal NSW Bowling Association: Annual reports 1880- (5m); Bowls in NSW 1920-1991; Bowls Alive in NSW 1992- .

About.References: Bowls Alive Magazine of the Royal NSW Bowling Association.
